968680.name: Virtual Battlemap DLC - Lost Temple
968680.description:
Lost Temples, were they used for sacrifice or as an outpost for other life forms! Create a simple broken down temple for player to camp in, or a home for an ancient artifact needed to open a portal to another world. Mix Lost Temple and Dungeon assets together to make millions of new maps! You can even mix the Lost Temple with all other DLC for unlimited map making power!

  • Over 500 new map building Assets
  • 5 New Panels Full of Lost Temple Building Content
  • Modular to allow the building a temple of any design
  • New Lighting Assets
  • Large Nature Asset Selection
  • Rounded Stairs (Filling Community Requests)
